ch0657_00_chusuke/0101_0701_01_10:
Pikaaa! I was waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0657_00_chusuke/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s hurry and start training! I’ll be Pikachu!
ch0657_00_chusuke/7101_0701_01_10:
There are lotsa different Pokémon, but Pikachu’s
my favorite!
ch0657_00_chusuke/7101_0701_02_10:
They’re not just cute—they also fight with flashy
lightning! Isn’t that super cool?!
ch0657_00_chusuke/7105_0701_01_10: If I ever DID become a Pikachu...
ch0657_00_chusuke/7105_0701_03_10: Then we could go on a journey together!
ch0657_00_chusuke/1701_0701_01_10: I was just looking for you!
ch0657_00_chusuke/1701_0701_02_10: Here! I brought you a present!
ch0657_00_chusuke/1701_0702_01_10:
I was pretending to be a Pikachu when I found it!
Pretty amazing, huh?
ch0657_00_chusuke/2501_0701_01_10:
There are items you can use to teach moves to
Pokémon, right?
ch0657_00_chusuke/2501_0701_02_10:
Then, maybe someday, people can learn to use
moves, too!
ch0657_00_chusuke/2501_0701_03_10: I’d be the strongest ever if I could use Thunderbolt!
ch0657_00_chusuke/2501_0702_01_10:
When I see a lot of different people, there’s
always a bunch of stuff that surprises me.
ch0657_00_chusuke/2501_0702_02_10: Us humans are just as mysterious as Pokémon!
ch0657_00_chusuke/3001_0701_01_10:
I practice my Pokémon cries in the morning!
Pi-pi-pi pika pika!
ch0657_00_chusuke/3003_0701_01_10:
The secret to becoming a Pokémon is to copy what
they eat and how they sleep!
ch0657_00_chusuke/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m scared of the dark, but it’s not so scary when
I’m with my Pokémon!
